-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Compatibility interface of cabal test-suite.
--   
--   This package provides compatibility interface module of cabal
--   test-suite.
@package cabal-test-compat
@version 0.2.0.0


-- | This module provides subset of compatibility interface names for Cabal
--   older than 1.16.
module Distribution.TestSuite.Compat

-- | Interface to make <a>Test</a> with an error case message to append.
prop' :: Testable prop => String -> Maybe String -> prop -> Test

-- | Interface to make <a>Test</a>.
prop :: Testable prop => String -> prop -> Test

-- | Interface type of <a>Test</a> list to export.
type TestList = IO [Test]

-- | Convert interface into <a>Test</a> list to export.
testList :: [Test] -> TestList
